description.narrative: The Samoa Small Grant Scheme is a key component of Australia’s aid to Samoa, its goal to contribute to the reduction of poverty and the achievement of sustainable development through small-scale interventions. The Small Grant Scheme is designed to be a flexible and rapid means of development cooperation. It aims to promote economic and social development through direct assistance to small scale community development in Samoa. An amount of AUD$250,000 is allocated to the Samoa Small Grant Scheme annually except for this Financial Year which we are requesting for AUD$310,000. Seeing that this will be the final arrangement for Samoa Small Grant Scheme in itself and the increase in number of reliable applications, for this reasons we inclined to increase our grant funding.
